_a-0000e74f-57e8-8000-9be4-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_createNoReplyEmailSender
_a-0000e74f-57e8-8000-9be4-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!siteUrl: rule!AS_CO_UT_getSiteUrl(),
  local!substringStartIndex: search("//", local!siteUrl) + 2,
  local!substringNumChars: search("/suite", local!siteUrl) - local!substringStartIndex,
  local!subdomainAndDomain: mid(
    local!siteUrl,
    local!substringStartIndex,
    local!substringNumChars
  ),
  concat("no-reply@", local!subdomainAndDomain)
)
